{{ja-kanjitab|くさり|かま|k2=がま|yomi=k|r=y}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くさりがま|鎖|tr1=kusari|t1=chain|鎌|tr2=gama|t2=sickle}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くさりがま}}

# {{lb|ja|weaponry|sort=くさりがま}} a [[Japanese]] [[martial art]]s [[chain]] [[weapon]], that consists of a ''[[kama]]'', ([[鎌]], the Japanese equivalent of a sickle), on a length of ''[[kusari]]'', ([[鎖]], metal chain), with a heavy ''[[fundo]]'', ([[分銅]], iron weight), at the end.

* {{ja-r|鎖鎌術|くさりがまじゅつ}}: chain sickle technique
